==============
blueprint-core
==============


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/blueprint_core.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/blueprint_core

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/RexWzh/blueprint_core.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.com/RexWzh/blueprint_core

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/blueprint-core/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://blueprint-core.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?version=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status




Python Boilerplate contains all the boilerplate you need to create a Python package.


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://blueprint-core.readthedocs.io.
